name: Register Voters - CA
instructions: Call first, then send a text!

callActions.name: Are you registered?
callActions.callScript: Hello {{contact.firstName}}, this is {{user.firstName}}.  Are you registered to vote in California?

textActions.name: Check your party affiliation
textActions.messageContent: Hey {{contact.firstName}} -- since you're already registered, be sure to check your affiliation before May 23rd to vote for Bernie!

textActions.name: Here's the link
textActions.messageContent: Hey {{contact.firstName}} -- here's that voter registration link: https://vote.berniesanders.com/CA
